name: Attack Space
description:
This game came about as an attempt to recreate TOMY's mechanical Space Invaders clone Attack in Space. I played around with the format a bit, but if you play Mode 1 you're essentially playing the same game. (Though you don't need to keep track of your score in your head)

Rather than offering a difficulty setting, I've allowed you to set the game's Speed and Timer to find the settings you like best.

If you play the game and enjoy it, let me know. You can contact me on twitter @metalsnail or on My Tumblr. Let me know your high score too!

Music was made using Drum Circle. Sounds were made using Bfxr.
